mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmcdocsisconfig ( entityId, ifIndex, ccmtsMddInterval, ccmtsMdfEnabled ) VALUES ( #{entityId}, #{ifIndex}, #{ccmtsMddInterval}, #{ccmtsMdfEnabled} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cmcdocsisconfig WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and ifIndex = #{ifIndex}
mapper.update: UPDATE cmcdocsisconfig SET ccmtsMddInterval = #{ccmtsMddInterval}, ccmtsMdfEnabled = #{ccmtsMdfEnabled} WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and ifIndex = #{ifIndex}
mapper.select: select entityId, ifIndex, ccmtsMddInterval, ccmtsMdfEnabled from cmcdocsisconfig where entityId = #{entityId} and ifIndex = #{ifIndex}
mapper.insert: insert into docsloadbalpolicy(policyId,entityId,docsLoadBalPolicyId) values (#{policyId},#{entityId},#{docsLoadBalPolicyId}) SELECT @@IDENTITY AS policyId

insert into docsloadbalbasicrule(ruleId,entityId,docsLoadBalBasicRuleId,docsLoadBalBasicRuleEnable,docsLoadBalBasicRuleDisStart,docsLoadBalBasicRuleDisPeriod) values (#{ruleId},#{entityId},#{docsLoadBalBasicRuleId},#{docsLoadBalBasicRuleEnable},#{docsLoadBalBasicRuleDisStart},#{docsLoadBalBasicRuleDisPeriod}) SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ruleId
